      • out

        public static void out(boolean condition,
                       Class<?> clazz,
                       Object... args)

        New structure for exception out ( RuntimeException ) UpException | WebException supported – outUp + outWeb

        Parameters:
        condition - The condition for throwing
        clazz - The exception clazz here ( because all the exception class first argument type is Class<?>, it means you can initialize logger inner this method instead of input
        args - dynamic objects for exception
